text: Noah Bryant Munck (born May 3, 1996 in Orange County, California) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Gibby Gibson on the Nickelodeon television series iCarly. ==Early life and career== Noah Munck was born in Orange County, California. He began his career in advertising spots. These included Volkswagen and "Got Milk?" In spring 2007, he went in hip-hop courses with his sister. Munck acted in iCarly from 2007 to 2012. From the season 4, he played a main role. In 2011, he was in the movie Bad Teacher as Tristan. ==Television and movie roles== Year Movie/Program Role 2007-2012 iCarly Gibby Gibson 2008 Wizards of Waverly Place Four Christmases screaming kid 2009 iCarly: iFight Shelby Marx Gibby Gibson ER All About Steve Student 2010 Rules of Engagement 2011 Bad Teacher Tristan The Rainbow Tribe iCarly: iParty with Victorious Gibby Gibson 2012 The Troop iCarly: iGoodbye Gibby Gibson 2013 Nicky Deuce ==Other websites== * * * Category:Actors from Orange County, California Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors
title: Noah Munck
